website_summaries.verdict: The X-Alp Summit delights individuals who aren’t afraid to go offroad. It uses components that can support pedaling through rough terrains as well as walking in them. The top is constructed to snugly wrap the foot to prevent blisters. To top it all off, it is designed in such a way that it can even be used as an everyday footgear.
pros: A myriad of buyers is impressed with how good their feet feel while wearing the Pearl Izumi X-Alp Summit for both biking and hiking
The outsole provides reliable grip during treks, says plenty of owners
According to the droves of people, this mountain cycling shoe is very durable
Many cyclists like that the closure on this model securely holds their foot
Several folks are amazed that this product also works well with flat pedals
Numerous shoppers are pleased with the aesthetics of this trainer
cons: The X-Alp Summit feels a bit heavy for some users
The cleats that came with the footwear is too short, says one commenter

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but not for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up after reading numerous reviews, and the shoes were still too tight so I returned them. I need shoes with a wider toe box. However: this shoe has everything I was looking for: the Vibram sole would provide great traction while bike-hiking; the soles were not overly stiff and it was easy to walk around in them; the outer material appears to be extremely tough and waterproof but most likely not very breathable. I ended up purchasing FiveTen Kestrel Lace ups in my normal shoe size. However, I had to use some shoe-stretcher spray to loosen the right shoe just a bit and now they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Arch

customer_reviews.title: The clasp does a good job of tightening the shoe for bike rides
customer_reviews.text: After having returned a previous pair of shoes from a different brand due to being too tight, I was nervous about ordering my actual shoe size (11.5US). These shoes are accurate to actual size (although if anything, just on the tiny bit oversized, but maybe it was due to wearing very thin, almost dress socks when trying them on). The clasp does a good job of tightening the shoe for bike rides, but I am concerned about the life-length of the clasp. I also picked this shoe due to the slate blue accent, which turned out to be an almost exact match to my bike. I would recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: KFas

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe that has worked great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a bit to really try out the shoe and now I have used them 25+ times and I really like them. They can really tighten nicely on my slightly narrow feet and I love the ratchet strap. I have not seen that before but it works really well on getting just the right amount of tightness. I have also done some short amount of walking in the woods and they have good traction on rocks and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Benson

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: No. No cycling shoe comes with cleats. Those varies. That said, as a mt. biker for over 23 yrs, I can't see how'd you disappointed in these. I mean, I use to buy the high-dollar shoes but these work better! Rubber soles vs hard plastic over wet rocks, etc.... Cleat costs are minimal in comparison. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Solid, great quality and true to fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great and like the tread design. The speed ratchet is good and the fit is perfect. I am a 13, bought a 13 and the fit is true. High quality shoe for a super discounted price. I did notice that the outer sole near the crank arm hit the frame occasionally but a small adjustment of the cleat should fix that. I’d probably buy them at full price based on quality and fit. Very happy with the bomber shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Flagstaff

customer_reviews.title: sizing runs really small
customer_reviews.text: after reading reviews regarding sizing runs small I ordered a 48 versus the 47 I typically wear. unfortunately, the 48 was still too small...I probably should have jumped from my normal 47 to 49 or possibly 50. the shoe itself looks well made but has a strong plastic feel to it, more than I typically like even in a utility shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around MTB shoe with excellent comfort and support!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really easy-to-use and COMFORTABLE shoe with great support and they're fast/easy to put on your feet. I'm using my shoes with SPD cleats and I didn't have to modify the sole of the shoe in any way to allow the cleat to engage my pedal - the shoes are perfect as-is right out of the box. Wish I had purchased these shoes sooner!
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: Great trail bike shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe with pliable Vibram tread for easy hiking-the-bike when necessary, yet stiff enough sole for immediate pedal response. Ratchet closure makes it easy to adjust tightness while rolling. I use Smart Feet insoles and experience no foot discomfort on long, pounding downhills.
customer_reviews.author: rmacchio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fit great really nice shoes for biking had hard time finding large sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Rooter

customer_reviews.title: The size runs small
customer_reviews.text: After returning the first two pairs, I received the right ones. I should have read the reviews and ordered them larger to begin with.Great shoes, nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Parson

customer_reviews.title: and fit good. just in case you were wondering on sizing
customer_reviews.text: i wear a size 15 american, these are a 49 Euro, and fit good. just in case you were wondering on sizing. Need to purchase Cleat Seats in addition.

product_meta.title: PEARL IZUMI Men's X-alp Summit Cycling Shoe
product_meta.description: A technical shoe designed to deliver superior comfort and durability for aggressive all-mountain riding. The seamless upper provides hours of comfort in or out of the saddle. A new sole featuring a ¾ length composite shank and Vibram® rubber provides maximum grip, longevity and pedaling stiffness.
feature_bullets: Advanced 3-Layer Seamless Composite Upper delivers all-day riding comfort and durability
1:1 Anatomic Buckle Closure System reduces hot spots and removes pressure from your instep
Nylon composite 3/4 shank for efficient power transfer and off-the-bike versatility.
Aggressive lugged Vibram Megagrip compound outsole for superior traction and durability
